branchCategory.name: Related Products
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC also offers a large selection of related products to further compliment our abundant line of air cylinder products. These include floating joints, shock absorbers and auto-switches (position sensors).</p>

branchItem.name: Floating Joints
branchItem.description: <p>Floating joints can absorb any "off-centering" or "loss of parallel accuracy" between the cylinder and the driven body.  Because of this, centering is unnecessary, installation time is drastically reduced, and a high level of machining accuracy is unnecessary.  These are made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: Shock Absorber
branchItem.description: <p>The 90-RB shock absorber has a specially designed  orifice that compensates for varying speeds and loads to consistently decelerate loads without  requiring additional adjustment.  The double  seal enclosure consists of a scraper and a rod seal, provides extra insurance against leakage. 90-MGP is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: Auto Switches
branchItem.description: <p>Auto switches on actuators and air grippers for sensing the end of stroke. Solid state type switches are included with a pre-wired connector and two color indication light. Reed switches have lead wire and indicator light option.  Made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>
